## Container.addInterceptor() method

Set an interceptor, this means than the class selected for the interceptor will be executed when a exception is throw.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addInterceptor(interceptor: Interceptor): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  interceptor | [Interceptor](./cloudfunc.interceptor.md) | Class than implements [IInterceptor](./cloudfunc.iinterceptor.md) interface |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
